definition[0]: one of a pair of long thin narrow pieces of wood or plastic that you fasten to your boots and use for moving on snow or on water
example[1]: a ski resort  (=where people can go skiing)
definition[1]: a long thin narrow piece of strong material, fastened under a small vehicle so that it can travel on snow
definition[2]: to move on skis for sport or in order to travel on snow or water
example[3]: We skied down to the village of Argentière.
